title: Cap Streamers, early 18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Brussels style
creditline: Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf Esq. in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Brussels-style cap streamers in a symmetrically arranged design of foliage and slightly conventionalized floral motifs.
